name: Introduction to Archaeology
description: An introductory course to the field of Archaeology, covering the basics of archaeological methods, research, and theory.

name: Introduction to Forensic Archaeology
description: An introduction to the field of Forensic Archaeology, covering the basics of its methods, research, and theory.

name: Archaeology of Human Remains
description: A course covering the analysis of human remains found through archaeological methods, and the legal and ethical implications of such research.

name: Forensic Anthropology
description: A course covering the anthropology of human remains, including their analysis and application to crime.

name: Advanced Forensic Archaeology
description: An advanced course in Forensic Archaeology, covering more complex methods, research, and theory.
